entry.title: poker face
entry.summary:
Author: notsi11yw0rm (si11yw0rm)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,228Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 48

Summary: Seungmin’s always been a pro at keeping his cool; especially in front of the camera. But tonight? He has a secret. It comes in the form of a vibrating plug controlled by his hyung, Bang Chan. And as Chan’s teasing texts buzz relentlessly through Seungmin’s phone, pushing him toward the edge of overstimulation, Seungmin fights to maintain his flawless poker face...Or die trying.
